Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You really do like surprising me, don't
you? Is my face that handsome when I'm
surprised?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>The real issue here is that thanks to
you, my proposal plan is ruined.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I was preparing the ultimate situation
for the world's best proposal. It's too
bad you won't get to see it, princess.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Well, this means you love me enough to
propose to me, right? In that case, this
situation isn't so bad.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<FACE_ROUGH>Okay, <MYNAME>. You're the perfect person
to spend the rest of my life with. I
accept your proposal.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<FACE_LOVE>I love you, my princess. I'll make you
the happiest woman in the world.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I need to tell the fellas in the town
that we're getting married. Let's go,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're finally getting married, aye?
Congratulations to the both of you!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is wonderful! Allen, it's up to you
to make <MYNAME> happy!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Come on, who do you think you're talking
to? Instead of worrying about me, you
should worry about yourself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>By the way, Dunhill, can I ask you to
officiate at the wedding ceremony?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course you can! <MYNAME> has done so
much for me. It's the least I can do.
<PAGE>
I'll do the best job I can. Is there
anything else you need help with?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can prepare the wedding venue for you.
I may not look the part, but I've
actually got a good sense of style.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I can also prepare the clothes for the
wedding. I'll let Allen know when they
arrive.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What day is good for you? I think 
<BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE> would be just about right. 
Is that fine?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah, that works. Dunhill, Rod, I'm
counting on you two.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
On <BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE>, <MYNAME> will truly be
mine... You're looking forward to
it, right princess?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Um, <MYNAME>, I just want to be sure...
that blue feather is really for me,
right?
<PAGE>
Ever since I was little, I've always
dreamed of making a happy, warm,
smiling family.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I've been thinking that it would be
great if I could make that dream a
reality together with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>You beat me to it, but let me say it to
you too. Will you... marry me?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for choosing me, <MYNAME>. Let's
build a happy life together.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
From now on, I'm going to devote myself
to you completely, and I'd like to ask
you to do the same for me.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, I love you more than anyone else
in the whole wide world.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now let's go tell the townspeople that
we're gonna get married!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're finally getting married, aye?
Congratulations to the both of you!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, Rod. You don't find a
good woman like <MYNAME> very often. Try
not to lose her, okay little buddy?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I won't. After we're married,
we'll hold hands together every night
in bed. Thanks for your blessings.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>By the way, Dunhill, I want to have a
wedding in the town. Could you marry us?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I can! <MYNAME> has done so much
for me. It's the least I can do.
<PAGE>
I'll do the best job I can. Is there
anything else you need help with?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll prepare the wedding venue. You can
leave it all to me. Expect a great
wedding with someone like me in charge.
<PAGE>
I'll also take care of the clothes that
you two will wear at the ceremony.
After they arrive, I'll give 'em to Rod.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What day is good for you? I think 
<BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE> would be just about right. 
Is that fine?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If it's fine with <MYNAME>, it's fine with
me. Thanks, you two. I'm counting on
both of you.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I can't wait for <BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE>. I know
you'll look stunning in your wedding
dress.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My little <MYNAME>, I mean, <MYNAME>, I may
be a little long-winded, but please
indulge me today.
<PAGE>
Ever since I came to this town, you've
shared important feelings with me that
I had begun to forget.
<PAGE>
Now I want to give you more than enough
happiness to pay you back for all those
feelings you've shared.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, you've got a long life ahead of
you. Will you share it with me?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. Let's get married.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
It really is true that everyone has
someone who they're destined to be with.
I'm so grateful that I met you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, my little <MYNAME>, shall we go let
everyone know that we're getting
married?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>When we tell everyone, what will their
faces look like? When I think about our
age difference, I have mixed feelings.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're getting married, aye? It's great
that your love brought you together
despite your ages. Congratulations!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is wonderful. Soseki, <MYNAME>,
congratulations on your marriage.
<PAGE>
Soseki, you're much older than her, so
make sure to focus on being a reliable
husband from now on.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks, you two. I'll work hard to make
sure that little <MYNAME> doesn't ask for
a divorce!
<PAGE>
By the way, Dunhill, if it's not too
much trouble, can I ask you to officiate
at the ceremony?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course you can! <MYNAME> has done so
much for me. It's the least I can do.
<PAGE>
I'll do the best job I can. Is there
anything else you need help with?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll prepare the wedding venue. I'll
make sure that you two have a wedding
you can be proud of.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What day is good for you? I think 
<BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE> would be just about right. 
Is that fine?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's good for me too. I appreciate
this, you two. I'm counting on both of
you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, we'll only be boyfriend and
girlfriend for a little longer, but
let's enjoy that too while it lasts.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please excuse me. I seem to be somewhat
flustered by this sudden proposal.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But I've also been thinking more and
more about marriage ever since we first
started seeing each other.
<PAGE>
I had intended to enjoy our time as a
couple a little longer, but if you want
to get married now, <MYNAME>...

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I want to marry you as well.
Please allow me to take that blue
feather.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
From now on, I'll always be by your
side, <MYNAME>. Let's live our lives
together.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Shall we go announce our intent to
marry? Please take my hand, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're finally getting married, aye?
Congratulations to the both of you!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, Sanjay. <MYNAME>, please
take good care of Sanjay.
<PAGE>
I've known Sanjay for a long time, and
he's like a member of my family. I
couldn't be happier for him.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you very much. Amir, Dunhill, I'm
grateful for your words of
encouragement.
<PAGE>
Dunhill, may I ask you to officiate at
the wedding?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course you can! <MYNAME> has done so
much for me. It's the least I can do.
<PAGE>
I'll do the best job I can. Is there
anything else you need help with?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let me prepare the wedding venue. Oh,
and you'll be needing some attire.
Please allow me to handle that as well.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What day is good for you? I think 
<BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE> would be just about right. 
Is that fine?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yes, that's fine with me as well. I am
truly grateful for the support you two
are offering me. I know I can trust you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, it looks like we're going to
have a delightful ceremony. I'm already
looking forward to it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh man, proposing out of the blue with
no warning. It's too sudden!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But I'm not saying I didn't like it,
so I guess it's fine...
<PAGE>
I couldn't imagine marrying anyone but
you. You feel the same way, right?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Ah, <MYNAME>. Let's get married. The
cooking will be your job. Don't you
forget it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I'm happy that you proposed to
me. I guarantee that I'll make you
happy.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's go, <MYNAME>. If we're gonna have a
wedding, we'll need the townspeople to
help us out.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're finally getting married, aye?
Congratulations to the both of you!
<PAGE>
Neil... It's so good to see you happy.
Remember to appreciate your family.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You two have known each other longer
than most young couples nowadays. You
share a deep connection with each other.
<PAGE>
I'm sure the two of you will make a
wonderful family. Good luck.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah, please keep watching over us from
here on out, will ya.
<PAGE>
Oh yeah, Dunhill, can I ask you to marry
us?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course. You and <MYNAME> have done so
much for me. It's the least I can do.
<PAGE>
I'll do the best job I can. Is there
anything else you need help with?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please let me handle the wedding venue.
Oh, and you two will be needing wedding
attire as well.
<PAGE>
It's been awhile since we had a
wedding. This is so exciting! You two
can count on me.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What day is good for you? I think 
<BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE> would be just about right. 
Is that fine?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah, that's good. I want to give this
girl a nice wedding. I'm counting on you
two.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, the wedding's not far away. Be
careful not to get hurt. You're the star
of this wedding after all.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh, I'm sorry... I'm so happy that I
don't know what to say.
<PAGE>
I've always wanted to be needed by
someone not as a prince, but as myself.
<PAGE>
But somewhere deep down I had given up
on that dream... Until I met you, that
is.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, with you by my side, I think I
can live a happy life, both as a prince
and as myself.
<PAGE>
So let's get married, <MYNAME>. Thank you
for proposing to me.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This feeling must be what they call
love. <MYNAME>, I'll always treat you
right.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well <MYNAME>, let's go announce that
we're getting married. I'll also need to
write a letter to my parents.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
So you're getting married! I see.
Congratulations to the both of you!
<PAGE>
I'm sure you and Amir will be happy
together, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Master Amir, Miss <MYNAME>,
congratulations.
<PAGE>
It's truly wonderful that master Amir
is getting married to someone who he
loves from the bottom of his heart.
<PAGE>
Miss <MYNAME>, words cannot express my
gratitude to you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks, you two. I really appreciate
your words of congratulations.
<PAGE>
By the way, Dunhill, I want to get
married in this town, may I ask you to
officiate at the wedding?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course you can! <MYNAME> has done so
much for me. It's the least I can do.
<PAGE>
I'll do the best job I can. Is there
anything else you need help with?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll handle the preparations for the
ceremony's venue. I'll also prepare
the wedding attire.
<PAGE>
We'll use our home country's special
royal wedding clothes.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What day is good for you? I think 
<BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE> would be just about right. 
Is that fine?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's fine. Thank you so much, you two.
There's not much time until the wedding,
but I know I can count on you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm very excited about our wedding,
<MYNAME>. I haven't been this excited
since I first came to this town.
<PAGE>
We'll probably be very busy with
preparations, but let's work together
and do our best.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I can't believe you, <MYNAME>. You
proposed to me so suddenly. You really
surprised me there!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But I was really happy! I am a girl
after all. I've always dreamed of being
proposed to and getting married.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Um, <MYNAME>. I want to get married to you
too. Will you take me as your wife?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. From now on I'll
always be by your side doing whatever I
can to make you happy!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I love you, <MYNAME>. I always have, and I
always will.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey <MYNAME>, I know you just proposed,
but let's go announce our marriage! I'm
sure everyone will be excited.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I see, so you're getting married!
Congratulations to the both of you!
<PAGE>
Make Tina a happy woman, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, Tina! Getting married
to <MYNAME>, huh?! I'm so jealous.<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, I want you to make Tina
happier than anyone else in the world!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks, you two. I'm so happy.
<PAGE>
Oh yeah, Dunhill, we want to have a
wedding of course. Can I ask you to
officiate the ceremony?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course you can! <MYNAME> has done so
much for me. It's the least I can do.
<PAGE>
I'll do the best job I can. Is there
anything else you need help with?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll take care of the wedding venue.
I'll have Clement make something extra
delicious!
<PAGE>
I'll also prepare the wedding clothes.
I'll get in touch with Tina when they
arrive.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What day is good for you? I think 
<BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE> would be just about right. 
Is that fine?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That sounds good to me! I'm sure you two
will do a fantastic job!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
A wedding! And then we'll be living
together as a couple! I can't wait,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>... that proposal gets a score of
zero points. I just can't believe how
lame it was!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Did you think I would say "yes<RED>∀</RED>" to
such a proposal? You'll have to come
up with something better than that!
<PAGE>
What? If you come up with something
better, will I marry you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Th-That's not what I'm...

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Oh, okay.
<PAGE>
If you really want to marry me that
much, I suppose I'll let you. Y-You'd
better appreciate this!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Make me the happiest wife in the world,
okay? I won't stand for anything less.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now let's go tell everyone we're getting
married! We need to ask them to help us
with the ceremony after all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Tee-hee. I wonder what kind of
wedding gifts we'll get. I'm looking
forward to finding out.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I see, so you're getting married!
Congratulations to the both of you!
<PAGE>
Make Michelle a happy woman, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, Michelle! You
look really happy. I'm happy too.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks, you two. I'm so happy that I
can't stop smiling!
<PAGE>
I suppose I should actually be grateful
to <MYNAME> for proposing to me.<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>By the way, Dunhill, can I ask you to
officiate at the wedding? I don't know
who else to turn to...

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course you can! <MYNAME> has done so
much for me. It's the least I can do.
<PAGE>
I'll do the best job I can. Is there
anything else you need help with?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll take care of the venue.
I'll also make the wedding clothes.
You can count on me.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What day is good for you? I think 
<BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE> would be just about right. 
Is that fine?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yes. I'm counting on you!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, It feels good to be
congratulated by everyone, doesn't it?<RED>∀</RED>
I can't wait for the wedding!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I was waiting for you to propose
to me.
<PAGE>
I've been thinking that I want to be
your wife because I really like you.
<PAGE>
That's why today is the happiest day
of my life.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, would you propose to me again?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm so happy! <MYNAME>... Thank you for
choosing me.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Spring, summer, fall, winter... Morning,
noon, night...
<PAGE>
We'll always be together from now
on... It's a promise.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I need to tell my mother... I'm
sure she'll be happy. Let's go, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I see, so you're getting married!
Congratulations to the both of you!
<PAGE>
Make Yuri a happy woman, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I thought you were still just a child...
But here you are leaving the nest.
Congratulations, Yuri.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, I'm very proud of my little
daughter. Please take good care of her.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you. Your congratulations make
me very happy.
<PAGE>
Dunhill... I want to have a ceremony.
Please help with the preparations.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course! <MYNAME> has done so much for
me. It's the least I can do.
<PAGE>
I'll do the best job I can. Is there
anything else you need help with?

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll take care of the venue. I'll do
everything I can to make sure you two
have a fantastic wedding ceremony.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What day is good for you? I think 
<BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE> would be just about right. 
Is that fine?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yes... I know I can count on you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>... I'll make the wedding
clothes... I hope you'll like them.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
For some time now, I've been thinking
about how I want to spend more time with
you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I didn't want to bother you though, so
I kept my feelings to myself. But it's
so difficult when I can't see you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE><MYNAME>, to think that you would ask me
to marry you... I feel like I'm in a
dream.
<PAGE>
Our lives are still just beginning, will
you please share the rest of yours with
me?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I humbly accept your
proposal.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm overjoyed right now. <MYNAME>, I love
you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
... We need to tell the townspeople that
we're getting married. Let's go, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I see, so you're getting married!
Congratulations to the both of you!
<PAGE>
Make Iroha a happy woman, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, Iroha! I'm so jealous
that you're getting married. I know
you'll be happy!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dunhill, Tina, thank you very much...
With your support, I know I'll be happy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>By the way, Dunhill, I wonder if you
would do me the honor of officiating at
the wedding ceremony.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I will! <MYNAME> has done so
much for me. It's the least I can do.
<PAGE>
I'll do the best job I can. Is there
anything else you need help with?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can leave the venue preparations to
me. I'm good at these kinds of things!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What day is good for you? I think 
<BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE> would be just about right. 
Is that fine?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yes. I'm sorry to trouble you when
you're so busy, but I know I can count
on you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Before the wedding I'd like to start
organizing my things in preparation for
moving.
<PAGE>
It's very exciting, isn't it, <MYNAME>? I
can't wait for <BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE>.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I've been waiting for you to
show me a blue feather for a long time
now.<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
I mean, if we live in the same house, we
can be together all the time!
<PAGE>
I want to be with you as much as
possible, <MYNAME>. So please give me that
blue feather.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so happy that I feel like I might
cry. Thank you very much, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I love you, <MYNAME>. From now on, I'll
whisper those words into your ear every
day.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm going to go tell Clement that we're
getting married. Do you wanna come with
me?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I see, so you're getting married!
Congratulations to the both of you!
<PAGE>
Make Felicity a happy woman, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
